private method context::Reaction::BOP::add::_check (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in _check: 6
sub _check {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->Error("Can't add %s and %s",$self->{lop}->TYPE,$self->{rop}->TYPE)
     unless $self->{lop}->isChemical && $self->{rop}->isChemical;
  $self->SUPER::_check(@_);
}
public method context::Reaction::BOP::add::equivalent (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in equivalent: 6
sub equivalent {
  my $self = shift; my $other = shift;
  return 0 unless substr($other->class,0,3) eq 'BOP';
  return $self->SUPER::equivalent($other) ||
         ($self->{lop}->equivalent($other->{rop}) && $self->{rop}->equivalent($other->{rop}));
}
